content.query:
--------------------------
-- CREATE VIEW Calendar --
--------------------------
CREATE VIEW gold.calendar
AS
SELECT 
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET
    (
        BULK 'https://my1stendtoendproject.blob.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Calendar/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS query1
